## Setup

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# packages/functions
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
theme_set(theme_minimal())

`%ni%` <- negate(`%in%`)

# data
df_raw <- readxl::read_xlsx(here::here("01_data",
                                       "DATASET XLSX 31-01-2024.xlsx"),
                            sheet = "DATA") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

\
\

## Data processing

```{r}
# df_raw %>% 
#   glimpse()

# df_raw %>% 
#   View()

# parse date (NOTE: 2 different formats...)
date_1 <- df_raw %>%
  slice(1:55) %>% 
  select(anr, datum) %>% 
  mutate(datum = dmy(datum))

date_2 <- df_raw %>% 
  slice(56:nrow(.)) %>% 
  select(anr, datum) %>% 
  mutate(datum = as.numeric(datum),
         datum = as.Date(datum,
                         origin = "1899-12-30"))

new_dates <- date_1 %>% 
  bind_rows(date_2) %>% 
  arrange(anr)

# check
summary(new_dates)

# recreate df
df <- df_raw %>% 
  arrange(anr) %>% 
  mutate(datum = new_dates$datum)
```
